name: Ferdausi Rahman
description: '''Ferdausi Rahman''' ({{nee|Begum}}; born 28 June 1941) is a Bangladeshi [[playback singer]]. She sang some popular film songs for [[Pakistan]]i films also in the 1960s especially working with the music composer [[Robin Ghosh]] in film [[Chakori]] released in 1967. She was awarded [[Ekushey Padak]] in 1977 and [[Independence Day Award]] in 1995 by the [[government of Bangladesh]]. She also got the 2015 [[Bangladesh National Film Award for Lifetime Achievement]]. She is still the only female to ever receive the [[Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Music Director]] for the film ''[[Megher Onek Rong]]'' (1976).
